Attributes.description: Techniques of purification, cloning, sequencing, restriction-hybridization analysis of plant nucleic acids, in vitro labelling of plant nucleic acids and proteins, and electrophoresis and immunodetection of plant proteins. Offered by the Biotechnology Teaching Laboratory in cooperation with Plant Science. Admissions to the course is limited and requires recommendation from the Program Coordinator.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Thu, Start Time: 10:00, End Time: 16:00, Building: To, Room: Be
